channel.title: [508] item wearing conditions
channel.description:
On my 508, it says i have to complete dragon slayer in order to wear my dragon plate I have and i still cant wear it.. So can someone tell me how to change that?
The same with quest cape. It also says i need to complete dragon slayer
~Thanks, naruto11230

item.title: [508] item wearing conditions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“naruto11230, post:5, topic:360216”][quote] if (wearId == 3140 && p.DragonSlayer != 5 || wearId == 1127 || wearId == 1121 || wearId == 9813 || wearId == 9814 && p.DragonSlayer != 5) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p,“You must complete dragon slayer before you can wear this.”);
return;
}[/quote]

Now what? Delete it?[/quote]Correct.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] item wearing conditions
item.dc:creator: @naruto11230 naruto11230
item.description:
@naruto11230 wrote:

if (wearId == 3140 && p.DragonSlayer != 5 || wearId == 1127 || wearId == 1121 || wearId == 9813 || wearId == 9814 && p.DragonSlayer != 5) { p.frames.sendMessage(p,"You must complete dragon slayer before you can wear this."); return; }

Now what? Delete it?
